actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education.

official_title: A bill to amend the direct student loan program under the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide for partial loan cancellation for full-time volunteer service with a tax-exempt organization, and for other purposes.
short_title: Higher Education Volunteer Services Amendments Act of 1987

summary.text: Higher Education Volunteer Services Amendments Act of 1987 - Amends provisions of the Higher Education Act of 1965 relating to the direct student loan program to provide for partial cancellation of such loans for service with a tax-exempt organization.

titles.title: Higher Education Volunteer Services Amendments Act of 1987

A bill to amend the direct student loan program under the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide for partial loan cancellation for full-time volunteer service with a tax-exempt organization, and for other purposes.
